original_title: How the 'Duke of Leisure' Reached His Winter Home
overview: Percival, a master-mind in the army of the deliberately unemployed, visits a fashionable restaurant and piles up a large meal by impertinent orders, but, before he gets a chance to eat he is detected and thrown out. He breaks a store window and so loudly proclaims his guilt that the police do not believe him.
title: How the 'Duke of Leisure' Reached His Winter Home
